page.title: 14Religion
page.content: In Seaton Delaval we have a{joint {church}which is used by Methodists and URC.It is on Elsdon Avenue and on 7th May, the minister Mr. Cash came to talk to us. He told us of the organisations which use the church. He also said that the old Presbyterian church which is near our school, was the first Presbyterian church to be built in England. On 9th May we had a visit from an officer of the{Salvation {Army}called Mrs. Dean. She told us of the history of the Army in Seaton Delaval and especially of a man called Harby Hook who was 91 and had served the Army in our town since his dedication in 1895. We also visited the local parish church,{Holy Trinity} in Seghill and were shown around by Father Murray. Many of us knew these people through going to Sunday School.
